USERNAME_REGEX - Static variable in class com.revature.banking.frontend.validation.Validation
Taken from StackOverflow and slightly modified: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1221985/how-to-validate-a-user-name-with-regex I require the first character to be an alpha (non-numeric) and I only allow underscores (one at a time) in between, no dashes or spaces.
